alert.note: Alert for Forest; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 9:52AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Forest, southeastern Vilas and northeastern Oneida Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 949 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a slow moving strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Kentuck Lake Campground, or 8 miles east of Eagle River. This storm is moving south at 5 mph. If this cell remains stationary, localized heavy rainfall will be possible. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Headwaters Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
